item.description:
I got a couple free tickets to Comedy at the Gas Light on this Friday the 23rd. Anybody interested in going? — in Portsmouth, NH.

 

More info:

Tickets:  I have 1 extra free ticket that has already been claimed.

However, according to the website, tickets are only .$5.00.

You can order these online at :   http://www.portsmouthgaslight.com/third_landing.cfm   

Show starts at 7:00, doors open at 6:00.

I plan on getting there for 6:30.

I'll have a MEETUP sign on the table.

We can go out for drinks after the show if anyone is interested. There are several nice pubs close by..or at the Gas Light itself.

Call me on my cell  (603 494-6543) or email me from the meetup site with questions.

There are TWO comedians performing. Here is a writeup:


Comedy Night - January 25th
Headliner Steve Scarfo - His high energy, real life approach to material coupled with his sometimes bizarre viewpoint is sure to strike a chord in any audience and keep them in stitches!
Brian Brinegar - Brian has worked as a stand-u comic in venues all across
New England including opening for Comedy Central’s Todd Barry. He focuses on audience involvement and is sure to get everyone laughing. A guaranteed good show. Doors open at 6pm and the show starts at 7. Special dinner menu available upon request

The snow storm that was predicted is now not going happen, so driving should be ok.

Thanks,

Gary
item.name: Comedy in Portsmouth
